message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1300000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $1200000. I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1150000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's worth to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offers. I'm counteroffering at $1250000. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you and the market price. Let me know if this is something you're willing to consider.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit below my budget. I'm willing to offer $1180000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable accepting your offer. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $1230000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to you and my initial offer. Let me know if this is something you're willing to consider.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit below my budget. I'm willing to offer $1190000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to accept your offer. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my initial offer. I'm counteroffering at $1270000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to you and my initial offer.
